creature.title: Bullywug Twitcher

block.name: Rancid Air
block.line: Each enemy that spends a healing surge within the aura is weakened until the start of the acting creature's next turn.

block.name: Aquatic
block.line: In aquatic combat, the bullywug gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against nonaquatic creatures.

block.name: Nature's Release
block.line: Any attacker that scores a critical hit against the bullywug regains 3 hit points.

block.name: Javelin
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 or Ranged 10/20 (one creature); +6 vs. AC

block.name: Spasmodic Leap
block.line: Effect: The twitcher is no longer marked, and it jumps 3 squares. This movement counts as a shift.
Attack: Melee 1 or Ranged 10/20 (one creature); +6 vs. AC
Hit: 2d8 + 4 damage, and an additional +1d6 damage if the twitcher has combat advantage against the target.
The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against the twitcher until the end of the twitcher's next turn.

creature.description: This frog-like humanoid spasms around the battlefield erratically, making it hard to know where its javelins will come from
